intro: Taeniopetalum arenarium subsp. borystenicum, commonly known as the Borystenian sand-rose, is a rare and endemic plant species native to the arid regions of Central Asia. It belongs to the family Boraginaceae and is characterized by its succulent, fleshy leaves and showy, violet-blue flowers.
